issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.62:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #7c4dff, surrounding text: #333333)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.62:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #7c4dff, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

issues.title: Not all th elements in this table have a scope attribute. These cells should contain a scope attribute to identify their association with td elements.

original_issue.message: Not all th elements in this table have a scope attribute. These cells should contain a scope attribute to identify their association with td elements.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > table:nth-child(20)
